author: Cristiano Ronaldo
text: We don't want to tell our dreams. We want to show them.

author: Lionel Messi
text:
You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to 
        sacrifice and work hard for it.

author: LeBron James
text: Don't be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.

author: Pele
text:
The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness 
        in winning.

author: Michael Jordan
text:
You have to expect things of yourself before you can do 
        them

author: Michael Phelps
text:
You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the 
        farther you get.

author: Tom Brady
text: I would never do anything outside of the rules of play.

author: Tiger Woods
text: If you come in second, you're just the first loser!

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
text:
Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop 
        your strengths.

author: Cristiano Ronaldo
text:
It is my conviction that here are no limits to learning, 
        and that it can never stop, no matter what our age.

author: Kobe Bryant
text:
Everything negative — pressure, challenges — are all an 
        opportunity for me to rise.

author: Chuck Daly
text:
If you're going to have to beg them to play, it's not going 
        to work.

author: Ronaldinho
text: God gives gifts to everyone, some can write, some can dance.

author: David Beckham
text:
I know that if I set my mind to do something, even if 
        people are saying I can't do it, I will achieve it.

author: Sir Alex Ferguson
text:
Once you bid farewell to discipline you say goodbye to 
        success

author: Dennis Bergkamp
text: Behind every kick of the ball, there has to be a thought.

author: José Mourinho
text:
I'm a European champion. I'm not one out of the bottle, I 
        think I'm a special one.

author: Pep Guardiola
text:
If you train badly, you play badly. If you work like a 
        beast in training, you play the same way.

author: Arsene Wenger
text:
Football is an art like dancing is an art - but only when 
        it's well done does it become an art.

author: Ray Lewis
text:
No matter the circumstances that you may be going through, 
        just push through it.

author: Floyd Mayweather
text:
It's about having personality…it's not about being the bad 
        guy, it's about entertaining people.

author: Usain Bolt
text:
Don't think about the start of the race, think about the 
        ending.

author: Alex Morgan
text:
Everybody has a talent, but it's what you do with it that 
        makes it great.

author: Cristiano Ronaldo
text:
I see myself as the best footballer in the world. If you 
        don't believe you are the best, then you will never achieve all that 
        you are capable of.

author: Jurgen Klopp
text:
The challenge is to stay cool enough to handle the pressure 
        in the moment so that you can succeed in the future.

author: Sir Alex Ferguson
text: You learn more from defeats than you do from victories

author: Paul Pogba
text:
When I say I want to become a legend, some people say it's 
        pretentious. For me, it's a challenge. My desire, a dream. I'm not 
        saying I'll get there, but it's what I want.

author: Cristiano Ronaldo
text:
Winning - that's the most important to me. It's as simple 
        as that.

author: Bruno Fernandes
text: I will give everything for the badge.

author: Diego Maradona
text:
To see the ball, to run after it, makes me the happiest man 
        in the world.

author: Neymar Jr
text: There is no pressure when you are making a dream come true.

author: Wayne Rooney
text:
I just hate losing and that gives you an extra 
        determination to work harder.
